post.body: That is hilarious. Would an imaginary VM license be free then? LOL
Just signed up to your newsletter. I am interested in hearing about your ideas.
I like GoDaddy myself. It seems to have a ton of options and easy to have everything up and running within a day unlike others.
Hard to believe I know. Just making World Superbike the place where everyone wants to be. The Hopper is jobless :(
What's plan B?
Always an accomplishment after a bike has been sitting awhile.
Thanks for the article and the information.
The article really relates to real world scenarios and doesn't try to shove a subject down your throat either. Good article!
2WheelTuesday wishes everyone a Happy New Years 2009! you can find it here http://timesurl.at/c55143
Off to buy some fireworks for New Years celebrations(neigborhood competition). I think I need a sign on my car "EXPLOSIVES INSIDE" LOL
